subject: Your RescuePC Repairs License is Expiring Soon
text:
Dear {{name}},

This is a reminder that your RescuePC Repairs license will expire on {{expirationDate}}.

License Details:
- License Key: {{licenseKey}}
- Type: {{licenseType}}
- PC Limit: {{pcLimit}}

To ensure uninterrupted access to our services, please renew your license before the expiration date.

Renewal Options:
1. Visit your dashboard: https://dashboard.rescuepcrepairs.com
2. Click on 'Renew License'
3. Choose your preferred payment method

As a valued customer, you can enjoy a 10% discount on renewal using the code: RENEW10

If you have any questions about the renewal process, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Best regards,
The RescuePC Repairs Team
